PERSONAL STATEMENT 
● 
An experienced web developer with an expansive knowledge of web languages, including 
HTML, CSS and JavaScript. I am interested in modern JavaScript frameworks, especially 
Angular, and I love building enterprise applications which gave me plenty of opportunities to 
apply what I’ve learned into reality.I work effectively in a team since I love sharing ideas & 
supporting each other. Besides, I also enjoy spend time working on my own to build personal 
projects or self-study new technologies. 
● 
Looking for a ambitious company which will challenge my developer and problemsolving skills 
and allow me to continue to develop my knowledge and potential. 
EDUCATION 
● 
Year 2009 - 2013:  
Hanoi University Of Engineering and Technology. 
● 
Major :  
Electronics and Telecommunications.
